data.instruction: Query reporting endpoints relevant to this UC and confirm metrics answer the UC business question.
data.expectedResult: Reports expose reliable KPI data that matches lifecycle actions in this run.

requestBody.title: Create resources representing hosts/assets/venues API Trace

data.instruction: Using agents tools, create a biz representing The Equipment Sharing Pool. Use name/slug derived from saga context.
data.expectedResult: Biz is created, owner is auto-added as member with owner role, and biz id is captured.
